_meta.source: Researched from Oman tourism, Sultan Qaboos Grand Mosque, and cruise port guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers terminal, Mutrah Souq, Grand Mosque, Old Muscat

transit_routes.name: Walk to Mutrah Souq
transit_routes.note: Scenic walk along the corniche to the souq.

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Grand Mosque
transit_routes.note: Grand Mosque is outside Muttrah. Open to non-Muslims 8am-11am (not Fridays).

featured_experiences.name: Mutrah Souq
featured_experiences.note: One of Arabia's oldest markets. Known locally as 'Al Dhalam' (the darkness).

featured_experiences.name: Sultan Qaboos Grand Mosque
featured_experiences.note: Non-Muslims welcome 8am-11am except Fridays. Modest dress required.

featured_experiences.name: Muttrah Corniche
featured_experiences.note: Scenic waterfront connecting port to souq. Portuguese-era watchtowers visible.
